After weeks of speculation, growing public anger and questions over the future of online digital privacy, Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg is testifying for the first time before Congress, which wants answers on how data of at least 87 million users was improperly shared with the GOP-aligned data crunching firm Cambridge Analytica.
Follow along with the live analysis of POLITICO reporters and editors, and ask us questions on Twitter using the hashtag #AskPOLITICO.
